availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Vann (Clinton County, Kentucky, grocer and county court judge)

body.p: Clinton County, Kentucky, grocer and county court judge. Kentucky native. Grocery keeper in Clinton County, Kentucky, in 1850. County Court judge in Clinton County in 1860. County Court judge in Clinton County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, Albany, p. 158A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, District 1, p. 283-284.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Clinton County Administrators Bonds,1864-1910, p. 135.
KYR-0001-020-0474.
